name: Ghanoz-eav
tagline: The hardcore way to validate email address
body:
ghanoz-eav
==========

The hardcore way to validate email address.

### How to install

```javascript
npm install ghanoz-eav
```

### How to use

```javascript
geav = require('ghanoz-eav');

geav.isValid('test@example.com');
```

or look over the test suite
